articles.title: 'He walks the talk': Shreyas hails Virat after record-breaking masterclass
articles.summary: Virat Kohli's masterful 93 guided India to a four-wicket victory in the first ODI against New Zealand, marking his 28,000th international run and surpassing Kumar Sangakkara in the record books. Shreyas Iyer, returning from injury, praised Kohli's consistent brilliance and steadying presence, while even rival Kyle Jamieson acknowledged Kohli's unparalleled influence on the game.
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk

articles.title: 'Is Virat Kohli arrogant?' Ajinkya Rahane gives a candid answer – Watch
articles.summary: Ajinkya Rahane offers a unique insight into Virat Kohli's mindset, revealing his greatness stems from a misunderstood 'attitude of learning and never giving up.' Rahane explains Kohli's pre-match withdrawal isn't arrogance but a method to enter his zone. Kohli's relentless work ethic and drive for improvement continue to define his record-breaking career.
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk

articles.title: Chase Kings: India first team to hunt down 300-plus targets 20 times in ODIs
articles.summary: India achieved a historic four-wicket victory over New Zealand in the first ODI, successfully chasing down a target of 301. This win marked their 20th successful pursuit of 300-plus totals in ODIs, a world record. Virat Kohli's 93 anchored the chase, with crucial late contributions from Harshit Rana and KL Rahul sealing the win.
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk

articles.title: Kohli surpasses Sangakkara to become second-highest international run-scorer
articles.summary: Virat Kohli became the second highest run-scorer in all forms of international cricket as he helped steer India to a four-wicket win in the first ODI against New Zealand.

articles.title: Badoni replaces injured Washington in India squad for NZ ODIs
articles.summary: Washington has been sidelined with a rib injury and will be assessed by the BCCI medical team

articles.title: Green, Maddinson power Thunder to victory after Renegades retire Rizwan out
articles.summary: Thunder remain bottom of the table while Renegades, stuck in seventh, saw their finals hopes fade

articles.title: 'Not a great feeling': Virat Kohli speaks out on crowd cheers after teammate's wicket
articles.summary: India's master batter Virat Kohli expressed discomfort with fans cheering his arrival at the crease upon a batter's dismissal, a practice he finds disheartening for the departing player. Despite this, Kohli remains grateful for fan support and focused on team victory, as demonstrated by his match-winning 93 in India's chase.
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk

articles.title: T20 WC in deadlock: ICC–BCB impasse deepens as Bangladesh venues remain unresolved
articles.summary: Bangladesh's T20 World Cup venue remains uncertain as the BCB seeks a shift to Sri Lanka due to security concerns. The ICC and BCCI are exploring Indian alternatives like Chennai and Thiruvananthapuram. This impasse follows a dispute over a player's IPL release, escalating tensions and impacting broadcast rights. Pakistan has also offered to host.
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk

articles.title: PM Modi-Merz meeting: Germany announces visa free transit for Indians; ink multiple agreements
articles.summary: India and Germany finalized 19 agreements, enhancing cooperation in defense, critical technologies, and clean energy during German Chancellor Friedrich Merz's visit. Key outcomes include visa-free transit for Indian nationals, a joint declaration on defense industrial cooperation, and significant German climate finance commitments.
articles.author: TOI News Desk

articles.title: Royal Challengers Bengaluru v UP Warriorz - WPL scorecard
articles.summary: Latest scorecard from the Women's Premier League match between Royal Challengers Bengaluru and UP Warriorz in Navi Mumbai.

articles.title: '40 balls daily daalne hain': The grind behind Ayush Badoni's maiden call-up
articles.summary: Ayush Badoni received a maiden India call-up for the remaining ODIs against New Zealand, replacing an injured Washington Sundar. His coach highlighted Badoni's dedication to improving his off-spin bowling, a skill he developed through rigorous practice. Badoni's all-round abilities and leadership experience also contributed to his selection.
articles.author: Amit Kumar

articles.title: 'Almost like Dhoni': Ex-India cricketer lauds finisher Rahul's single taking ability
articles.summary: KL Rahul showcased remarkable composure and adaptability in India's tense four-wicket victory over New Zealand. He expertly navigated a challenging chase, prioritizing strike rotation and protecting his partners before unleashing his finishing skills in the final overs. Chopra lauded Rahul's maturity and game awareness, comparing his calm demeanor to MS Dhoni's.
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk

articles.title: Big Bash: Pakistan's Mohammad Rizwan gets retired out after slow knock - Watch
articles.summary: Mohammad Rizwan became the first overseas player in the BBL to be retired out after struggling to accelerate the scoring for Melbourne Renegades.  He managed 26 runs off 23 balls, and his departure did little to boost the team's momentum, as they finished on 170/8. Rizwan's BBL campaign has been below expectations with 167 runs in eight matches.
